document_data.caption: A map showing Calamastyr Lane and surroundings in the Castle Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Calamastyr Lane
document_data.mainbody: '''Calamastyr Lane''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Calamastyr Lane was located in the northern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]]. The road originated on [[Julthoon Street]] where it branched southeast toward the [[Market (Waterdeep)|Market]] where it terminated on [[Bazaar Street]]. Several other roads connected with Calamastyr Lane along its length including [[Swords Street]], [[Gothal Street]], [[Elvarren's Lane]], [[Tchozal's Race]], and [[Melshar's Street]].
document_data.Notable Locations:
* [[Hammarak's Fine Laces And Adornments]], a women's clothing and tailor shop.{{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2012)/The Blue Baldric and Lace Harp}}
* The [[Spires of the Morning]]
